verses.roman:
mahā-pātra tāṅra sane kaila kolākuli
aneka sāmagrī diyā karila mitāli

synonyms: mahā-pātra—the Orissan representative; tāṅra sane—with him; kaila—performed; kolākuli—embracing; aneka—various; sāmagrī—materials; diyā—giving as gift; karila mitāli—established friendship.
translation: Before the governor left, the mahā-pātra embraced him and offered him many material gifts. He thus established a friendship with him.
